summary: Completed testing of governance editor pages UI refactoring. The main agent has partially implemented the refactoring to move 'Edit' functionality into 3-dot dropdown menus for consistency. MeetingEditorPage is fully refactored and matches the goal, but DistributionEditorPage and InsuranceEditorPage still have Finalize and Amend buttons as separate buttons outside the dropdown, which is inconsistent with the refactoring objective.

integration_issues.issue: Cannot fully test editor page UI interactions due to Google OAuth authentication requirement
integration_issues.notes: This is expected production security behavior. Testing completed through code analysis.

design_issues.notes: Lines 506-510 (Finalize) and 512-517 (Amend) should be moved into the dropdown menu for consistency

design_issues.notes: Lines 496-505 (Finalize) and 507-517 (Amend) should be moved into the dropdown menu for consistency

action_item_for_main_agent: UI refactoring is partially complete. MeetingEditorPage is fully refactored and matches the goal perfectly. However, DistributionEditorPage and InsuranceEditorPage still have Finalize and Amend buttons as separate buttons outside the 3-dot dropdown menu. These buttons should be moved into the dropdown menu to achieve full consistency across all governance editor pages as intended. Specifically: 1) Move Finalize button (lines 506-510 in DistributionEditorPage, lines 496-505 in InsuranceEditorPage) into dropdown, 2) Move Amend button (lines 512-517 in DistributionEditorPage, lines 507-517 in InsuranceEditorPage) into dropdown.
